snippet.title: Death of the Reprobate - Release Trailer
snippet.description: Death of the Reprobate is a Rabelaisian adventure game made from real Renaissance art. It is the third and final instalment of the critically acclaimed Immortal John Triptych, loosely following on from Four Last Things and The Procession to Calvary. It's basically Monkey Island meets Monty Python. Find it here -  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1739900/Death_of_the_Reprobate/
